item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity Datatype Description SoftLayer_Container_Utility_File_Entity data type models a single entity on a storage resource. Entities can include anything within a storage volume including files, folders, directories, and CloudLayer storage projects. External Links Internet media type at Wikipedia associatedMethods SoftLayer_Network_Storage::uploadFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::downloadFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getAllFiles SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getFileByIdentifier SoftLayer_Network_Storage::restoreFile SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getFilesPendingDelete SoftLayer_Network_Storage::getRecycleBinFileByIdentifier Local content A file entity's raw content. Type: binary data contentType A file entity's MIME content type.
